[30;1m902 | [0m[35mUpserting data[0m
[30;1m903 | [0m[35m==============[0m
[30;1m904 | [0m[35m[0m
[30;1m905 | [0m[35mUpserting allows you to insert records if they do not exist and update them if they DO exist, based [0m

[30;1m908 | [0m[35m[0m

[31m--[ [0m[34mMatch #[0m[33m64[0m[34m of [0m[33m695[0m[31m ]--[0m

[30;1m2462 | [0m[35m[0m

[30;1m2464 | [0m[35m[0m
[30;1m2465 | [0m[35m.. code-block:: bash[0m
[30;1m2466 | [0m[35m[0m
[30;1m2467 | [0m[35m    sqlite-utils create-index mydb.db mytable -- col1 -col2 col3[0m
[30;1m2468 | [0m[35m[0m
[30;1m2469 | [0m[35mThis will create an index on that table on ``(col1, col2 desc, col3)``.[0m

[30;1m981 | [0m[35m[0m

[30;1m2801 | [0m[35mOnce installed, running the ``sqlite-utils tui`` command will launch the TUI interface:[0m
[30;1m2802 | [0m[35m[0m
[30;1m2803 | [0m[35m.. code-block:: bash[0m
[30;1m2804 | [0m[35m[0m
[30;1m2805 | [0m[35m    sqlite-utils tui[0m
[30;1m2806 | [0m[35m[0m
[30;1m2807 | [0m[35mYou can then construct a command by selecting options from the menus, and execute it using ``Ctrl+R`[0m

[31m--[ [0m[34mMatch #[0m[33m329[0m[34m of [0m[33m695[0m[31m ]--[0m

[30;1m2466 | [0m[35m[0m

[30;1m2468 | [0m[35m[0m
[30;1m2469 | [0m[35mThis will create an index on that table on ``(col1, col2 desc, col3)``.[0m

[30;1m975 | [0m[35m[0m
[30;1m976 | [0m[35m``analyze-tables`` can take quite a while to run for large database files. You can save the results [0m
[30;1m977 | [0m[35m[0m
[30;1m978 | [0m[35m.. code-block:: bash[0m
[30;1m979 | [0m[35m[0m
[30;1m980 | [0m[35m    sqlite-utils analyze-tables github.db --save[0m
[30;1m981 | [0m[35m[0m
[30;1m982 | [0m[35mThe ``_analyze_tables_`` table has the following schema:[0m

[30;1m18 | [0m[35m[0m
[30;1m19 | [0m[35mThe ``sqlite-utils query`` command lets you run queries directly against a SQLite database file. Thi[0m
[30;1m20 | [0m[35m[0m
[30;1m21 | [0m[35m.. code-block:: bash[0m
[30;1m22 | [0m[35m[0m
[30;1m23 | [0m[35m    sqlite-utils query dogs.db "select * from dogs"[0m
[30;1m24 | [0m[35m[0m
[30;1m25 | [0m[35m.. code-block:: bash[0m

[31m--[ [0m[34mMatch #[0m[33m519[0m[34m of [0m[33m695[0m[31m ]--[0m
   Rule Id: [34mBD000700[0m
       Tag: [34mSecurity.Backdoor.DataExfiltration[0m
  Severity: [36mImportant[0m, Confidence: [36mLow[0m
  Filename: [33m/sqlite_utils-3.38/sqlite_utils/plugins.py[0m
   Pattern: [32m\.(request|post|get)\([0m
[30;1m18 | [0m[35m            "name": plugin.__name__,[0m
[30;1m19 | [0m[35m            "hooks": [h.name for h in pm.get_hookcallers(plugin)],[0m
[30;1m20 | [0m[35m        }[0m
